<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

This project is a Resume Analyzer. It should allow users to upload resumes (PDF or DOCX), extract and analyze key information (skills, experience, education), and provide feedback or scoring. Use Python and a simple web interface (Flask or Streamlit).
